HomePage.title: Unlock your Netflix stats
HomePage.subtitle: If you are a Netflix user, you most likely spent many hours or even days on the platform. But by default, the streaming platform doesn't give you many details about your viewing activities. That is why I created Checkflix. The free tool analyzes your Netflix data securely on your device.

step1.title: Request your data from Netflix
step1.description: Netflix lets you download your personal data <link>in your account settings</link>. Click on the button of that page. You will be asked to confirm the request via email. You will get a second email once Netflix prepared a file with all your personal data. That can take anything from a few minutes to a few days.

step2.title: Download your data
step2.description: Follow the instructions in the email you got from Netflix to download your user data. You will receive a zip-file named <highlight1></highlight1>. Save that file somewhere on your computer or mobile device. If you want, you can extract <highlight2></highlight2> from the zip-archive. That is the only file that will be analyzed by Checkflix.

step3.title: Come back to Checkflix
step3.description: You are ready to analyze your data. Click on the button below to  get started. In case that you have not received your personal Netflix data yet, you can try out Checkflix with a demo data set.

Metadata.title: Checkflix - Analyze your Netflix data
Metadata.description: Unlock your Netflix stats with this free tool! Learn which movies and TV shows you watched, how much time you spent on Netflix and when you binge-watched.

Upload.title: Your input
Upload.subtitle: You requested your user data and got a file from Netflix <tutorial>as described in our tutorial</tutorial>? Great! Select the file to analyze your viewing activity! All calculations are done on your device, they are not stored in the cloud. Please see our <privacy> privacy policy</privacy> for more details on how your data is processed.
Upload.loadDummyDataButton: Try Checkflix with a test dataset
Upload.errorLoadingDummyData: Failed to load the test dataset
Upload.dropInstructions: Drag and drop your file from Netflix here, or click to select

privacyCard.title: Data on your device
privacyCard.text: Checkflix saves the results of the analysis on your device (similar to how cookies are stored). This way you can still access them when you come back later. However, if you want to delete the data from your device permanently, just click on the (red) button.

Upload.unexpectedDataError: Unexpected data in the CSV file.
Upload.noValidDataError: No valid data found in the CSV file.

cookieConsent.startInfo: We use cookies and various tools in order to offer our website safely and reliably. They help us to optimize the website, deliver certain features and improve your personal user experience. We kindly ask for your permission to use these tools. You can change or revoke your consent at any time in the privacy settings by clicking on the link in the footer of the website.

youtube.companyAddress: Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland

youtube.warning: Please accept cookies for YouTube to view this video.

cookies.description: We use cookies and other web analysis technologies on various pages to make visiting our website attractive and to enable the use of certain functions. Below you will find details on which data can be processed by which service and for which purpose.
cookies.heading: Cookies and Services

purpose.heading: Purpose
purpose.text: Checkflix is non-commercial. This site was created as a final project as part of Harvard's <harvard>CS50 course</harvard>. Checkflix does not sell anything, especially not your data. Developer and operator of the site is <imprint></imprint>. Checkflix is made to present your Netflix statistics in an appealing way.

hosting.heading: Hosting
hosting.text: This webhosting provider for Checkflix is Hetzner Online with servers in Germany. Every hosting provider needs to process data like the browser, the IP address etc. in order to deliver the website. Details can be found in the <provider>the privacy policy of Hetzner</provider>.

data.heading: Data processing
data.text: When you submit your Netflix data to Checkflix, it is analyzed on your device. The file that is analyzed contains information about what you have watched on Netflix, when, where and with which device. This data is not stored on the server, but on your device in the browser cache. If you want to delete this data, you can do so at any time by clicking on the red button on the <upload>file input page</upload>.

analytics.heading: Analytics
analytics.text: Checkflix uses the open-source tool Umami for analytics. This tool collects anonymous statistics about the website usage. The data is stored and processed on servers of my webhosting provider and is not shared with third parties.

contact.heading: Contact form
contact.text: When using the contact form, the data you enter will be sent to me by email.

rights.heading: Right of information and deletion
rights.text: According to EU GDPR, you have the right to request information about personal data service providers store and the right to have this data deleted. To use Checkflix you do not have to create an account - and I do not have any data stored that can be clearly assigned to you. The data you provide is stored on your device and is not shared with me or third parties.

disclaimer.heading: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This app is not endorsed or certified by Netflix. Though we try our best, we do not guarantee that all calculations and results are accurate.

attributions.heading: Attributions
attributions.tmdb: Pictures, genre categorizations and summary texts of movies and TV shows are provided by <link></link>. But this app is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.
attributions.icon: TV Icon on homepage made by <author></author> under <license></license>. Available on <link></link>.
